body:
This will be the last one of our MegaScrim matches of our Marathon, so lets go out with a bang.

Time:

10am-12am- AST - Atlantic Standard Time

Team Captain:

We'll try to get 4 matches out of it!

Dawson vs ________

_______ vs ________

_______ vs _________

________ vs _________

Like I said before if you want to get a head start on being captain just hit me up on skype and I will edit the post and put your name in.

Teams Notified:

-Korea
-Assassins
-
-
-
-
-
-
-
-

If you wish for your team to invite you'll need to poke me on TeamSpeak if you see me or message me on Skype.

Good Luck to everyone that comes and I've hope you had fun the past few days

replies.body: Hey, sorry I left longer then I planned on but I got another scrim for a back up if you want  to come just poke me on skype and I will add you to the scrim. ./sv scrim02. Captains will be the same as in the original post.
